archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.3.4d: d) removing or adjusting access rights in a timely manner for users who have left the organisation (e.g. by removal, revocation or replacement of keys, authentication information, identification cards or subscriptions)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
